data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

However, as ____ was ____ the ____, ____ teacher ____ Robin ____. She felt extremely ashamed, and promised to never do it again.
data.partBlankContent: Robin wasn't doing well in school, and she had a big exam coming up. She w__ too la__ to st___, s_ she borr____ the te__ answers fr__ someone w__ had ta___ it rece____. However, as s__ was tak___ the ex__, t__ teacher cau___ Robin chea____. She felt extremely ashamed, and promised to never do it again.
data.fullContent: Robin wasn't doing well in school, and she had a big exam coming up. She was too lazy to study, so she borrowed the test answers from someone who had taken it recently. However, as she was taking the exam, the teacher caught Robin cheating. She felt extremely ashamed, and promised to never do it again.
data.answer: 罗宾在学校表现不好，她有一个重要的考试即将来临。她懒得学习，所以她从一个最近考过的人那里借了答案。然而，在她参加考试的时候，老师发现了罗宾作弊。她感到非常羞愧，答应再也不这样做了。
